sourcesContent:
import './index.scss' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { addCart } from '../../../store/modules/takeaway'; const Foods = ({ id, picture, name, unit, description, food_tag_list, month_saled, like_ratio_desc, price, tag, count }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{name}
{unit}
{description}
{food_tag_list.join(' ')}
月售{month_saled} {like_ratio_desc}
¥ {price}
dispatch(addCart( { id, picture, name, unit, description, food_tag_list, month_saled, like_ratio_desc, price, tag, count } ))}>+
) } export default Foods
